articles.description: Text messages prior to the doomed helicopter flight that killed NBA star Kobe Bryant and eight others show that weather conditions were a concern, and records show that the pilot appeared to become disoriented in fog.

articles.title: Did Maurizio Sarri misuse Cristiano Ronaldo in Juventus' Coppa Italia final defeat? | ESPN FC - ESPN UK
articles.description: ESPN FC’s Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens break down Napoli’s penalty triumph over Juventus in the Coppa Italia final and question Maurizio Sarri’s use of Cr...
